item.title: Report I-2024110068
item.description:
Report I-2024110068

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-28T06:19:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-12
  • City: Greensboro
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During the loading phase of trailer, employee was attempting to load a pallet of freight with a forklift, the pallet of freight punctured a box in front of the pallet. Contact was made at the bottom side of the box putting a 1.0 inch long puncture in the box that caused a puncture to the inner packaging. Inner packaging was then taken out placed in a position to where the material would not leak further. All spillage of material was confined to immediate area for cleanup.
